javadoc: The EolCommentFieldLocation class contains specific location information within the EOL comment field of a CodeUnitLocation object.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: comment
params.comment: comment text for the particular comment indicated by the address, subtype, and reference address.

params.name: displayableCommentRow
params.comment: the line within the Eol comment as displayed.

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: the character position on the line within the comment line.

params.name: currentCommentRow
params.comment:
the row index relative to the beginning of the End of Line comment 
 as displayed in the Eol comment field.

methods.javadoc:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 an end-of-line field location from XML.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Default constructor needed for restoring
 an end-of-line field location from XML.

name: EolCommentFieldLocation
comment:
The EolCommentFieldLocation class contains specific location information
 within the EOL comment field of a CodeUnitLocation object.
